text:
@DrDenaGrayson @FT @jburnmurdoch Don't sweat it, doc, and let's stop the disinfo between Cause  & Effect

Get R<1 w. masks + hygiene
ALL else is optional. Ie. can reduce R faster, but with great complexity + cost

Danes and Czechs say EASING LOCKDOWNS HAD PRODUCED NO COVID-19 SURGE
https://t.co/F1YvkntOlg
